input.parameter: SELECT @i := @i + 1 AS number, IF(@street = v.street_name AND @house = v.house, NULL, v.street_name) AS street, IF(@street = v.street_name AND @house = v.house, NULL, v.house) AS house, v.premises_num, v.include_restriction, v.exclude_restriction, @street := v.street_name AS street_eq, @house := v.house AS house_eq FROM ( SELECT vks.street_name, b.house, v.premises_num, v.include_restriction, v.exclude_restriction FROM buildings b INNER JOIN v_kladr_streets vks ON b.id_street = vks.id_street INNER JOIN (SELECT p.id_building, p.id_premises, premises_num, CONCAT('№',fh.include_restriction_number,' - ',DATE_FORMAT(fh.include_restriction_date,'%d.%m.%Y')) AS include_restriction, CONCAT('№',fh.exclude_restriction_number,' - ',DATE_FORMAT(fh.exclude_restriction_date,'%d.%m.%Y')) AS exclude_restriction FROM premises p INNER JOIN funds_premises_assoc fpa ON p.id_premises = fpa.id_premises INNER JOIN funds_history fh ON fpa.id_fund = fh.id_fund WHERE p.deleted <> 1 AND fpa.deleted <> 1 AND fh.deleted <> 1 AND fh.id_fund_type = 2 UNION ALL SELECT p.id_building, p.id_premises, CONCAT(p.premises_num,'(',sp.sub_premises_num,')'), CONCAT('№',fh.include_restriction_number,' - ',DATE_FORMAT(fh.include_restriction_date,'%d.%m.%Y')) AS include_restriction, CONCAT('№',fh.exclude_restriction_number,' - ',DATE_FORMAT(fh.exclude_restriction_date,'%d.%m.%Y')) AS exclude_restriction FROM funds_sub_premises_assoc spa INNER JOIN sub_premises sp ON spa.id_sub_premises = sp.id_sub_premises INNER JOIN premises p ON sp.id_premises = p.id_premises INNER JOIN funds_history fh ON spa.id_fund = fh.id_fund WHERE sp.deleted <> 1 AND spa.deleted <> 1 AND fh.deleted <> 1 AND fh.id_fund_type = 2) v ON b.id_building = v.id_building WHERE SUBSTRING(b.id_street, 1, 13) IN ([regions]) ORDER BY vks.street_name, b.house) v, (SELECT @i := 0, @street := NULL, @house := NULL) vars
